name: xcm_interior_key
description: XCM Interior Key Canonicalized [flattened xcmV1Multilocation from polkadot.js v1 with network field added]

name: xcm_v1_multilocation_byte
description: Polkadot.js v1 decodable bytes for XCM

name: symbol
description: Human readable string token (e.g. DOT, ETH, USDC, DAI, ...)

name: para_id
description: Native Para ID for XCM asset

name: interior_type
description: Number of arguments in XCM V1 Multilocation

name: xc_contract_address
description: For EVM Chains, precompiled Contract Address (if available)

name: xc_currency_id
description: Local indexes, used to specify Foreign Asset in each chain

name: confidence
description: Count of non-native parachains that have published the same multilocation
